greetings_response: What can we help you with today? Please tap on one of the buttons below. Swipe right for more options.
Confirm_Reservation: Do you have an existing and confirmed reservation with us?
Thank_Stay_Know: Thank you for your interest in staying with us. What would you like to know today?
Thank_Room_Type: Thank you choosing Marina Bay Sands! Select the type of room you are most interested in
Thank_MasterCard_Help: Thank you for your interest in our shows at the Mastercard Theatres. How can we help you today?
